Other Information.Additional Info: Higher adsorption capacity for D2 compared to H2

Other Information.Test Conditions: 77 K, helium carrier gas flow rate 60 mL/min
Other Information.Additional Info: Higher adsorption capacity for D2 compared to H2

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Resolution R = 1.66 for o-H2/D2 separation at 77 K

Other Information.Additional Info: Stronger adsorption of D2 compared to H2
